text: Voyage To The Bottom Of The Sea was an American science fiction television series, which run from 1964 to 1968, starring Richard Basehart as Admiral Harriman Nelson, and David Hedison as captain Lee Crane. It was on American Broadcasting Company. It was created, produced and directed by Irwin Allen. Its final episode "No Way Back" was on air on the 31st of March, 1968. ==Other websites== * Category:1960s American television series Category:1964 American television series debuts Category:1968 television series endings Category:American science fiction television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Voyage To The Bottom Of The Sea
